creator: QM4 Designs
descriptionHtml:
A Forex trading tool that generates alerts when a pre-defined Forex price level is reached.

Ideal for technical traders waiting for key price levels to be reached.

Forex price alert triggers can be set on the bid or ask price. Uses Google's messaging service. The App doesn't need to be running in order to receive an alert.


Features:

* REAL TIME STREAMING DATA - Uses a dedicated, reliable real-time Forex price feed.
* BID AND ASK TRIGGERS - Set a price trigger on either the Bid or Ask price.
* TOUCH-PAD ENTRY - Quickly set / Adjust price levels using swipe gestures.
* SORTING - Sort by trigger distance, symbol, or manually sort pending alerts
* SUPPORT FOR OREO's (8.0+) ADVANCED NOTIFICATION FEATURES


Premium version:

* UNLIMITED ALERTS
* 30+ FOREX PAIRS - Including Metals and USD Index.
* CUSTOM TEXT MESSAGE - Describe what the alert means.
* LONG DURATION ALERTS SOUNDS


FAQ's

QUESTION: What's the difference between the Free and Premium version?

ANSWER: The Free version has less Forex pairs, and has a limited total number of pending alerts. However the Free version has no Ads, and uses the same real-time price feed and other features. The free version is fine if you mostly trade major Forex pairs and only require a few pending alerts at a time.


QUESTION: Can I make the alert sound a custom ringtone?

ANSWER: Yes, but only for Android 8.0 (Oreo) and above. Earlier versions of Android don't support ringtone tone sounds for notifications.

To add a custom ringtone notification sound, you'll first need to add your custom ringtone file to the downloads/notifications folder. Then go to the App's Settings / Sounds and select your custom ringtone from the list. Custom ringtones provide a way to create longer duration alert sounds.


QUESTION: Is the Forex price data real-time or delayed?

ANSWER: The Forex quotes are real-time, for both the free and premium versions.


QUESTION: Does the App need to be running to receive an alert?

ANSWER: No. The App uses Google's messaging service. Our server continually checks your alerts and will send a notification message to your device if the trigger condition is reached.


QUESTION: I set an alert, but didn't receive a message when it was triggered.

ANSWER: There could be several reasons. Firstly, go to Android settings, and make sure that notifications are enabled for the App. Also make sure your device is not in a silent mode, and the volume isn't muted.

Messages are sent from Google's messaging server. If your device has poor signal quality, or the network connection between Google's servers and your device is disrupted for some reason, there's a chance the message won't be received.

So to ensure reliability, make sure your device has a stable internet connection, and is using a good quality ISP.


QUESTION: Does the App run in split screen mode

ANSWER: Yes.


If you have any problems, please contact us at support, and we'll help you out. To contact us, go to the App's menu and click "Contact Support"

title: Forex Price Alerts

creator: QM4 Designs
descriptionHtml:
A Forex trading tool that generates alert notifications (alarms) when a pre-defined price level is reached. Also supports Cryptocurrencies and Indices.

Alert triggers can be set using the bid or ask price. Uses Google's notification messages.

The App doesn't need to be running to receive an alert. You'll still receive price alert notifications if the App is not running or is in background.

Features:

* REAL TIME STREAMING DATA - Uses a dedicated, reliable real-time steaming price feed.
* BID AND ASK TRIGGERS - Set a price trigger on either the Bid or Ask price.
* TOUCH-PAD ENTRY - Quickly set / Adjust price levels using swipe gestures.
* SORTING - Sort by trigger distance, symbol, or manually sort pending alerts



Premium version:

* UNLIMITED ALERTS
* CUSTOM TEXT MESSAGE - Describe what the alert means.
* LONG DURATION ALERTS SOUNDS
* EXTRA SYMBOLS - Extended Forex, Crypto & Indices


FAQ's

QUESTION: What's the difference between the Free and Premium version?

ANSWER: The Free version has less Forex pairs, and has a limited total number of pending alerts. However the Free version has no Ads, and uses the same real-time price feed and other features. The free version is fine if you mostly trade major Forex pairs and only require a few pending alerts at a time.


QUESTION: Can I make the alert sound a custom ringtone?

ANSWER: Yes, but only for Android 8.0 (Oreo) and above. Earlier versions of Android don't support ringtone tone sounds for notifications.

To add a custom ringtone notification sound, you'll first need to add your custom ringtone file to the downloads/notifications folder. Then go to the App's Settings / Sounds and select your custom ringtone from the list. Custom ringtones provide a way to create longer duration alert sounds.


QUESTION: Is the Forex / Crypto / Indices price data real-time or delayed?

ANSWER: The quotes are real-time, for both the free and premium versions.


QUESTION: Does the App need to be running to receive an alert?

ANSWER: No. The App uses Google's messaging service. Our server continually checks your alerts and will send a notification message to your device if the trigger condition is reached.


QUESTION: I set an alert, but didn't receive a message when it was triggered.

ANSWER: There could be several reasons. Firstly, go to Android settings, and make sure that notifications are enabled for the App. Also make sure your device is not in a silent mode, and the volume isn't muted.

Messages are sent from Google's messaging server. If your device has poor signal quality, or the network connection between Google's servers and your device is disrupted for some reason, there's a chance the message won't be received.

So to ensure reliability, make sure your device has a stable internet connection, and is using a good quality ISP.


QUESTION: Does the App run in split screen mode

ANSWER: Yes.


If you have any problems, please contact us at support, and we'll help you out. To contact us, go to the App's menu and click "Contact Support"
descriptionShort: Set Forex Price Alerts (Alarms), plus Crypto and Indices. Fast, reliable.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: No longer need to confirm deletion of individual alerts.
